title: Permabanned for someone else being toxic...
body:
Played a game with a random from my friends list. Someone I had added a while ago that just randomly asked me to duo. He died early as sup then just raged at his adc all game. I honestly just tried to chill everyone out at the start till everyone gave up. Yet, I get my account banned. Rito plz...this is bs.



Chat log. Not saying I was perfect but def nothing ban worthy.

This is the only game. There is no game 2 etc.



Game 1

Pre-Game

TSM Vicious TSM: they full ad lol

TSM Vicious TSM: wonder what ill build lol

In-Game

TSM Vicious TSM: children children

TSM Vicious TSM: relax

TSM Vicious TSM: its low elo chill

TSM Vicious TSM: dont expect anyoen to understand anything

TSM Vicious TSM: jsut try to carry

TSM Vicious TSM: vi might be at drag

TSM Vicious TSM: buy pink wards

TSM Vicious TSM: not much i can do with this team

TSM Vicious TSM: ya litearlly nothing to do lol

TSM Vicious TSM: ...

TSM Vicious TSM: def removing you lol

TSM Vicious TSM: he just being toxic

TSM Vicious TSM: mute and move on

TSM Vicious TSM: their comp is ass too

TSM Vicious TSM: should be freelo

TSM Vicious TSM: im not being a toxic pos

TSM Vicious TSM: lol

TSM Vicious TSM: you didnt ask me shit lol

TSM Vicious TSM: ok muted

TSM Vicious TSM: your tilted and just mad

TSM Vicious TSM: acting like a baby

TSM Vicious TSM: hes just making stuff up still lol

TSM Vicious TSM: who is iron lol

TSM Vicious TSM: you?

TSM Vicious TSM: move on at 20 plz

TSM Vicious TSM: just report brand and get a new game going

TSM Vicious TSM: who else is voting no

TSM Vicious TSM: and why

TSM Vicious TSM: kayle or yorik?

TSM Vicious TSM: i know its not ashe lol

TSM Vicious TSM: its gonna be over in 5 min one way or another son

TSM Vicious TSM: you dont have power

TSM Vicious TSM: look at your name

TSM Vicious TSM: who is more likely to be the toxic troll

TSM Vicious TSM: later little boy

TSM Vicious TSM: have a nice life

Post-Game

TSM Vicious TSM: reported

TSM Vicious TSM: super toxic lol

TSM Vicious TSM: what a little child

replies.body:
Calling somebody a child is a shitty fucking way to de-escalate a situation. It is a blatant insult.

Since you had a recent 14-day ban, at which time you'd have been warned that further flaming would result in a perma, this is completely on you.
calling someone a child is all it takes to get permabanned lol. wtf game is this. also if you are acting like children you should be prepared to hear it. lets grow tf up
Yes, ruining the game for your fellow players through unsportsmanlike conduct and toxic behavior is bannable. Surely this isn't news to you.

"ruining the game" lol bro what world do you live in?????? You have one player flaming everyone, swearing freaking out from the 3rd minute, and literally everyone on my team is in agreement that he should be reported and banned... And calling him a child and agreeing with the group that his behavior is crazy and should be reported is just as bad? What have we come to...

You picking a fight with the guy escalated the situation and ensured everything went to shit for your team. It doesn't particularly matter who started flaming. Fact is, you joined in when you knew damn well that you were on the brink of getting permabanned for that behavior.

My point.

Your head.
he is correct you harrassed a player and instigated further behaviour being on your last warning the ban is 100% correct.

First of all, let's clear one thing up:

> **Permabanned for someone else being toxic...**

You won't ever get punished for someone else's misbehavior. You get punished based on _your actions alone_.

Nobody types or acts for you but you. So you got permabanned for _your own misbehavior._

> TSM Vicious TSM: children children
TSM Vicious TSM: relax
TSM Vicious TSM: its low elo chill
TSM Vicious TSM: dont expect anyoen to understand anything

This already is a generally negative start - calling people "children", and telling people not to expect anyone to understand anything.

> TSM Vicious TSM: not much i can do with this team

This doesn't help matters, either. Don't try to big yourself up as though you could make even terrible comps work - 9/10 times, you're not going to be some pivotal, carrying force.

> TSM Vicious TSM: def removing you lol
TSM Vicious TSM: he just being toxic
TSM Vicious TSM: mute and move on

This is a 50/50 kind of deal. You don't need to point out that someone's being toxic - if they can see the person's chat, odds are high they already know as much. Beyond that, the rest is generally unnecessary.

> TSM Vicious TSM: im not being a toxic pos
TSM Vicious TSM: lol
TSM Vicious TSM: you didnt ask me shit lol
TSM Vicious TSM: ok muted
TSM Vicious TSM: your tilted and just mad
TSM Vicious TSM: acting like a baby
TSM Vicious TSM: hes just making stuff up still lol
TSM Vicious TSM: who is iron lol
TSM Vicious TSM: you?

Arguing, insulting, and continuing arguments, even after supposedly "muting".

> TSM Vicious TSM: move on at 20 plz
TSM Vicious TSM: just report brand and get a new game going
TSM Vicious TSM: who else is voting no
TSM Vicious TSM: and why
TSM Vicious TSM: kayle or yorik?

Report rallying and starting to harass people over voting "no" on a Surrender vote.

> TSM Vicious TSM: you dont have power
TSM Vicious TSM: look at your name
TSM Vicious TSM: who is more likely to be the toxic troll
TSM Vicious TSM: later little boy
TSM Vicious TSM: have a nice life

More pointless insults - again; _you got punished for **your** toxicity, nobody else's._

> TSM Vicious TSM: reported
TSM Vicious TSM: super toxic lol
TSM Vicious TSM: what a little child

And you continue it into the post-game lobby.

If you recently came off of a 14-day suspension, then yeah, this behavior would net you a permanent ban. You were warned with the 14-day ban that any further misbehavior would result in a permanent ban, and that you should be on your absolute best behavior. Other people being toxic does not excuse you when _you_ start being toxic yourself.

I see your points. They are just weak af. I never said i was perfect but he was being super toxic and I'm just the type to keep it real. I don't live in lala land where you just ignore everyone being an asshole. In post game I'm responding to someone else who asked to report him.
You don't have to be happy about it. You just have to not violate rules in your chat.

I'm here to point out a flaw in the system. Not to say I didn't technically break a rule. Literally one guy is being a total asshole, raging at everyone, ruining the game for everyone, everyone agrees he is a total pos who should be reported and banned, and we also ban the people who call him out for being a total pos. Regardless what the rules say, that is just a bad system. With that same logic we shouldn't kill terrorists because killing is bad...

So... Him making your game bad... You do the same thing?

Two wrongs don't make a right.

The analogy to terrorism is completely dumbfounding at best, and is nowhere near accurate.

I did nothing to ruin the game... No one else on my team was remotely upset with me. We were all in clear agreement that his behavior was insane and he should be reported. My adc just gave up after he started taking all the CS and this kinda deflated the game for mid who's lane was soon invaded by the troll after he was bored of stealing the adc's CS. Everyone just gave up after that. And if you don't like my analogy you can try to point out how it's not accurate, rather than just saying it's not.

You keep pointing out others. Others this, others that.

It. Doesn't. Matter. The rules don't say "don't be toxic unless someone else was toxic first". They say "don't be toxic".

They don't say "you can all flame someone if everyone else is in agreement". They say "you don't get to flame people".

They don't say "it's okay to be toxic if someone else in the game was more toxic". They say "it's not okay to be toxic".

You seem to have missed my entire point. Like can you even read? I'm not saying I didn't break the rules. I'm talking about how the rules/system is flawed. Come on bro, lets bring that reading comprehension level up.

Flawed because you got punished for increasing negativity?

The vast majority of the community believes negativity isn't okay ever. Not even if "he started it" or "the other guy was worse". You're free to feel differently, but that doesn't mean it's flawed. Your opinion being different doesn't make the system flawed.

Any system that punishes someone who is swearing and freaking out and ruining a game the same as someone just reacting to them without swearing or saying anything besides his behavior is childish is flawed. Sorry you can't see it.

That's your opinion. And your opinion is at odds with the opinion of most of society and many League players.

Majority opinion wins. Sorry you can't see it.
Show me the poll...
That's still your OPINION. That does not make the system flawed.  Maybe say "i THINK the system is flawed" and not try to state it as matter of fact.

> I see your points. They are just weak af.

Not quite as weak as your justifications for your misbehavior.

> I never said i was perfect but he was being super toxic and I'm just the type to keep it real.

And yet, you went on to harass and insult people. That's not really "keeping it real".

> I don't live in lala land where you just ignore everyone being an asshole.

I don't either.

> In post game I'm responding to someone else who asked to report him.

That still doesn't excuse your misbehavior.

Who did I harass and insult? You say "people" but never once did I say anything directed to anyone other than the flamer. My comments about not being able to help the team are cause ppl and just went basically afk at that point. Get off your high horse bro. I get that this is kinda your thing, you have to take this position but let be real for a sec. 1 rager, 4 people all agree hes a toxic pos. I call him a child a few times and I'm just as bannable as he is? There is no logic here other than, "welp thats just the rules" and I get that. Just saying they aren't good ones.

> Who did I harass and insult? You say "people" but never once did I say anything directed to anyone other than the flamer.

So, what? If you're flaming a flamer, _congrats_. Now there's two flamers making the game that much worse for everybody else.

> I get that this is kinda your thing, you have to take this position but let be real for a sec.

I'm under no obligation to hold any particular position. If my position is against toxicity, then it's a position I chose voluntarily, not because I had to.

But sure, let's be real for a sec.

> 1 rager, 4 people all agree hes a toxic pos. I call him a child a few times and I'm just as bannable as he is?

One rager, four people in agreements that he's toxic, and one of them steps forward and starts raging too. Now there's two people going at it with their own little flamewar, focusing more on each other and how bad the other is than they are on the game.

You did more than just call him a child a few times.

> TSM Vicious TSM: he just being toxic
> 
> TSM Vicious TSM: acting like a baby
>
> TSM Vicious TSM: who is iron lol
>
> TSM Vicious TSM: who is more likely to be the toxic troll
> TSM Vicious TSM: later little boy

So, tell me, what benefit is there to insulting the flamer umpteen times? Did it magically make them see the error of their ways? Did it turn the game around and net you a win?

Flaming accomplishes nothing besides putting you in a position to be punished yourself. It doesn't matter if you think you're justified in flaming them - it literally accomplishes _nothing_.

So, between that and the fact that getting into a flamewar detracts from the game as a whole - disrupting the game for everyone else, as well as making you play worse for your focus being on the target of your flame rather than on the game - you can see why flaming, regardless of circumstance, warrants punishment.

> There is no logic here other than, "welp thats just the rules" and I get that. Just saying they aren't good ones.

That's only the surface level logic. As explained above, there's more in general that goes into those rules than you care to acknowledge.

And, whether you like it or not, and whether you agree with them or not, the rules are good. They're just not good for you.

OK i get! You don't want to have a discussion about the rules and whether or not they are good. You live blindly by them and die by them. And you could never possibly understand how someone might want to express frustration about having something that is supposed to be enjoyable ruined by someone flaming. Understood sir.
Why even make a post? What's the goal here?
Venting to my gf wasn't satisfying enough

> [{quoted}](name=TSM Vicious TSM,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=g2jHrPiJ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-01-27T19:58:48.571+0000)
>
> Venting to my gf wasn't satisfying enough

Poor girl. If she gets tired of dealing with you, tell her to add me. :)
https://i.imgur.com/oIa9dQA.jpg[/img]
Sure thing, whats your ign

let's see where you went wrong shall we?

> mute and move on

you said that twice but clearly did not mute him. if you had your chat log would not be this long.

> just report brand and get a new game going

asking others to report a player is harassment and reports do not stack. so that is a double negative right there.

> acting like a baby

and 

> later little boy

name calling. that would add more fuel to the fire. 

had you simply muted him off the get go and not fall into his trap you would have a better game experience and would still be playing. and seeing as this was a permaban you had gotten a 14 day ban prior meaning thin ice. one wrong step, which you did, and *splash* down you go.

This is a video game. That lvl of shit talk is normal. And I was telling someone else to "mute and move on" cause they were getting caught up in his toxic raging. Never said i was perfect but nothing I did or said should EVER be reportable. Let's not live in some grand delusion that real gaming has no banter.
Essentially, you're saying that you don't need to treat others with respect because they're on the other side of the computer screen from you.
No im saying THIS person deserved no respect cause he was flaming like crazy.... Everyone else should just be able to bs a little and not get mad.
You don't get to make that call. If he was flaming, you should have muted, reported, and moved on with your life.
Well no one really knows what i should have done but if you mean thats the only way to avoid a ban i gotchu. Sadly I just have to keep it real.
"Keeping it real" is all well and good, but just like at work or in class or in a relationship, saying anything that comes to mind is gonna land you in trouble.

I mean...if my gf acted like this, telling her that she was acting like a child would be just fine. If I was behaving like this flamer in rl she would be well within her right to smack me in the head. And at work/class, if I saw someone speaking to a coworker/student remotely like this, telling him he was a child and telling that coworker to report him to HR/Dean immediately would be the most appropriate reaction.
This isn't banter. This is being an asshole.
Calling someone that is raging at everyone a child is being an asshole? What?

So what you're saying is that if someone acts worse than you, you are 1000000000000% clear to act any way you want just as long as you don't hit that miniscule fraction JUUUST above their level of douchebagery?

odd, last I knew reports did stack

if multiple people report someone for something I always assumed that it would draw more attention to that player

> [{quoted}](name=MordridtheBlack,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=g2jHrPiJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-27T19:19:11.383+0000)
>
> odd, last I knew reports did stack
> 
> if multiple people report someone for something I always assumed that it would draw more attention to that player

Fortunately, they don't. All you need is one report to trigger an investigation. More change nothing.

Its both fortunate and unfortunate. Cause the asshole troll always reports someone too. Every troll takes someone down with them cause at least one guy is gonna be annoyed enough to tell the troll to fuck off and thats all it takes, boom you both banned.
It's a fair assumption to make, but it's incorrect. Multiple reports carry no more weight than a single report.

It doesn't. The IFS only takes into account if the number of reports is a value greater than 0 - 1-9 reports triggers a review, with no increased scrutiny for higher numbers of reports. 0 reports = no review.

Long and short version; reports don't stack.

As it's clear the OP isn't interested in listening to feedback, this thread has been locked.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
 
~ Ulanopo

Banned for harrassment by means of report calling and in general harrassment. Normally it would take like 3 games of this level of rule breaking to warrant a ban, i'm guessing you only posted a single game and not all of them if you've been banned.
